# Linchon & Newton INC

> Global Technology Conglomerate specializing in GenAI, Fintech Infrastructure, IoT, GovTech, and Web3 solutions.

## About

Linchon & Newton INC is a global leader providing 51+ enterprise-grade As-a-Service (XaaS) offerings. Founded in August 2024, headquartered in Seychelles, we empower digital transformation with SOC 2, ISO 27001, and GDPR compliant solutions.

## Core Services

### GenAI & Frontier Tech
- AI Agents and Autonomous Systems
- LLM-as-a-Service platforms
- Computer Vision solutions
- Machine Learning pipelines
- Natural Language Processing

### Cloud & Infrastructure
- Enterprise cloud solutions
- Kubernetes orchestration
- DevOps automation
- Serverless computing
- Edge computing

### Financial Ecosystem
- Payment gateway infrastructure
- Digital banking platforms
- Fintech APIs
- Transaction processing
- Compliance automation

### GovTech & IoT
- Smart city solutions
- Government platforms
- IoT device management
- Sensor networks
- Public sector digitization

### Web3 Platforms
- Blockchain infrastructure
- DeFi protocols
- Smart contract development
- NFT platforms
- Decentralized applications

## Key Features
- 51+ As-a-Service offerings
- 99.9% uptime SLA guarantee
- 24/7 global enterprise support
- SOC 2 Type II compliant
- ISO 27001 certified
- GDPR ready

## Subscription Tiers
- **Starter**: For emerging ventures and MVPs
- **Growth**: For scaling operations (Most Popular)
- **Enterprise**: Custom solutions with full support
